channel.title: codal-core on micro:bit v2 Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in codal-core on micro:bit v2 Documentation

item.title: Accelerometer
item.description: CODAL’s accelerometer abstraction class. Allows for reading of the micro:bit’s built in accelerometer data, as well as the configuration of the sample rate and range.

item.title: Button
item.description: Represents a single hardware button. Allows for button press event tracking.

item.title: Compass
item.description: A compass abstraction. Reads the magnetometer to determine the orientation of the device, applying tilt compensation from data provided by the accelerometer.

item.title: CoordinateSpace
item.description: Representation of a coordinate space, for easy transformations in 3D space related abstractions.

item.title: KeyValueStorage
item.description: A simple key-value storage medium implemented with flash as the backing store. Utilises an in-memory scratch buffer.

item.title: LEDMatrix
item.description: A software representation of an LED matrix, also used to represent the micro:bit’s LED display.

item.title: ManagedBuffer
item.description: A mutable reference counted byte buffer, for general purpose use.

item.title: ManagedString
item.description: A copy assignable, immutable string class implemented using basic reference counting.

item.title: MessageBus
item.description: A lightweight message bus implementation, with asynchronous event handling using the fiber scheduler.

item.title: MultiButton
item.description: Represents a multi-button group, which can then be detected as a single press event.

item.title: NVMController
item.description: A generic interface to represent non volatile memory controllers.

item.title: Pin
item.description: Abstraction for a simple generic pin, with ability for handling both digital and analogue I/O.

item.title: Sample3D
item.description: A three dimensional vector representing sample data retrieved from a 3D abstraction.

item.title: Timer
item.description: A low level timer abstraction, adding integration with the CODAL message bus event system.

item.title: TouchButton
item.description: Represents a button triggered by capacitive touch. Can be hooked for press events.
